accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Top 3 (Category: Economics) on Bandung Open Data Challenge
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
We're (team of 4) developing westjavainc (westjavainc.org) mobile app including data visualisation (data obtained from http://data.go.id/) for economic opportunity in west java. this app is one of top 3 app for category Economics at Bandung open data challenge (http://teknojurnal.com/bandung-open-data-challenge/) 

winning announcement:
https://twitter.com/CodeforBandung/status/571566078452613120

accomplishment_projects.title: City Insights
accomplishment_projects.description:
City Insights is a website and mobile application for people reporting problem to the city government. Users can send photos, videos, location, and any other information about their problem. The uniqueness of City Insights is the rewarding system which is created to attract people and social insights feature which is crawling and detecting complaints about the city problems from social media.
This project bring our team to be finalist at IBM Developer War Day 2015. Url : http://devwarday.com/blog/pengumuman-finalist-2015

accomplishment_projects.title: WestJavaInc Mobile Application
accomplishment_projects.description:
We created the prototype of West Java Incorporated (westjavainc.org) Android mobile app. The contents are scraped from westjavainc.org website using PhantomJS. We also added some new features including graphical data visualization using D3JS and UMKM (Usaha Mikro Kecil dan Menengah) profile viewer.

This app was one of top 3 app for Economics category at Bandung Open Data Challenge (http://teknojurnal.com/bandung-open-data-challenge/) 

Winning Announcement: https://twitter.com/CodeforBandung/status/571566078452613120

accomplishment_projects.title: Neural Network And Genetic Algorithm for Unreal Tournament
accomplishment_projects.description:
This research implements an artificial intelligence for bot on The Unreal Tournament 2004.
The Artificial Intelligence is developed using The Pogamut framework and The Java
programming language.
The Artificial Neural Network is used as an artificial intelligence
for the bot to decides which actions should be taken by the bot.
The bot can choose to shoot opponents, to take opponent's flag, to take own's flag, back to it's own base, move to opponent's base, to flee from the opponent, to change weapons, or to take items.
Decisions are made based on the health point, the distance to the flag, the distance from opponents, and the other conditions from environment in the game.
The Genetic Algorithms is used to train the Artificial Neural Network.
Results from the experiments show that the bot sometimes takes decision exactly like
the behaviour of human player.
